ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who corrupt the earth and do not put things right.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who corrupt the land and do not reform it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and spread mischief in the land rather than set things right."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who spread evil in the land with no reform."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Those who spread turmoil in the earth, and do no reform.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who make mischief in the land, and reform not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who make mischief in the land and do not act aright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who do corruption in the earth, and set not things aright.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who spread corruption in the earth, and reform not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: those who spread corruption in the land instead of putting things right."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who work corruption in the land and rectify not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who cause corruption in the land and do not bring about reform.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who make mischief in the land, and mend not (their ways)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who make mischief in the land, and reform not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who corrupt in the earth, and do not reform'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Who spread turmoil on earth, and do not reform.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:152] who cause corruption in the earth, through acts of disobedience, and act righteously’, by being obedient to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who spread corruption in the earth) through disbelief, idolatry and calling to the worship of other than Allah, (and reform not) they do not command righteousness.
